summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1365, for the improvement of Eastlake Avenue in the City of Seattle, from Almy Street to Twelfth Avenue North, by grading and regrading, curbing and guttering said portion of said avenue, under Ordinance No. 15063 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
